EmailTemplate.name: BEACON AMA Sales Process Training Webinar Reminder 10.8.14
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder to Register! Webinar Invitation - BEACON AMA Sales Process Training
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reminder! Join us for a webinar: BEACON AMA Sales Process Training.
When
Monday, October 13, 2014 at 11:00 a.m. CDT Register
OR
Friday, October 17, 2014 at 2:30 p.m. CDT Register
Presenters
John Fillinger, Director of Utility Marketing
Kristie Anderson, Product Marketing Manager
To register for the webinar:
1. Click the registration link above for the date and time you would like to attend.
2. On the next page, Click "Register". 3. On the registration form, enter your information and then click "Submit".
Once your registration has been approved, you will receive a confirmation email message with instructions on how to join the event.
**Please note: You will need to register for this event and attend the event on a desktop computer/laptop. The WebEx system will give you an incorrect time if you try to register on your smartphone.
As always, we welcome your input. Please feel free to contact us with any comments or suggestions you may have. Submit Feedback
